modName: Viktoria the Vampire - CBBE UNPB TBBP compatible
summary: Viktoria is a vampire that you have to free before she accept to follow you.
descriptionHtml:
Check out my other mods [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6886180/?tb=mods&pUp=1]HERE[/url][/u]

Viktoria is a breton vampire who has been captured and is in jail inside Helgen Keep, in the corridor just after the torture room.
You can free her by lockpicking the door, then she will ... go her way without following you.

You can free her during the quest "unbound", or later when visiting again Helgen Keep. The main idea was to create a follower who has a good reason to help you, that you can obtain at the very start, but who don't break the original playtrough.
It seems to be fully compatible with alternate starts mods, and any other mod, as long as Helgen Keep cell is not modified.

Whenever may be the time you choose to free her, she will go her way out of the keep, fighting any opponent, but won't be hostile to you or your allies, even if she may be a little rude when speaking !! At this time, she wears a modified version of the prisoner clothes from Cotyounoyume's LSAR mod, and nothing else.
She'll travel to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun, where she will sandbox after having a bath and new clothes. Still, her body bears scars as a souvenir of her jailers ...
At this time, follower dialogue will be enable.

She is a very nice vampire, so she won't be attacked by people, and don't attack them.

She wear tavern clothes, and has a complete customized vampire armor set (custom armor with vanilla boots and gloves) in her inventory, as well as an elven dagger.
This armor is made from Cotyounoyume and Nausicaa mods.

Her perks are stealth, silence, lightfoot, muffled movement, augmented frost and destruction expert. Her spells are vampiric drain, ice spear and conjure boneman.
She has 1500 magicka offset, just to not run out of magicka during a fight.

[u][size=4]Requirements :[/size][/u]

Skyrim up to date and Dawnguard.

[u][size=4]Known issue :[/size][/u]

If you reach the Bannered Mare before Viktoria and wait for her in this cell, she may be totally stucked inside the inn near the fireplace. Using "recycleactor" fixes this.


[b][i][color=blue]VERSION[/color] FRANÇAISE [color=red]DISPONIBLE[/color] sur la page des téléchargements.[/i][/b]

There is also optional BBP and TBBP meshes for people using custom skeleton like XPMS. Just overwrite Viktoria's body files with the one fitting you requirements (UNPB version also include outfits meshes). For those who have issue with the scripts (Viktoria don't moving to Whiterun) there is a simple version, with just the pretty vampire waiting for you at the Bannered Mare.

By request of my friend ista3, there is now an UNPB version available. The body textures of Helgen Viktoria have been replaced to fit the new body meshes. The outfits have also been converted.
